scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket cdcu-sample --s3-prefix sample-services --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name cdcu-s3-example-dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides Stage=dev
scripts.deploy-prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name cdcu-s3-example-prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides Stage=prod
